name: Round Brilliant
description: The most popular cut with 57-58 facets, maximizing brilliance and fire.

name: Princess
description: Square or rectangular shape with pointed corners, often with 76 facets.

name: Emerald
description: Rectangular shape with cut corners, featuring parallel facets that create a hall-of-mirrors effect.

name: Asscher
description: Octagonal shape with large step facets and cropped corners, similar to emerald cut but square.

name: Cushion
description: Square or rectangular shape with rounded corners, combining brilliance and vintage appeal.

name: Oval
description: Elongated round brilliant cut, often creates the illusion of greater size.

name: Marquise
description: Elongated shape with pointed ends, maximizing apparent size and creating unique look.

name: Pear
description: Teardrop shape combining elements of round and marquise cuts.

name: Heart
description: Romantic symbol shape featuring a cleft at the top and pointed bottom.

name: Radiant
description: Rectangular or square shape with cut corners and brilliant-style facets.

name: Trillion
description: Triangular shape, often with rounded sides, creates a dramatic look.

name: Baguette
description: Rectangular shape with step-cut facets, often used as side stones.

name: Standard Cabochon
description: Smooth, domed top with flat bottom, ideal for displaying phenomenal effects.

name: Double Cabochon
description: Domed on both top and bottom, creating a lens-like appearance.

name: Fantasy
description: Unique, one-of-a-kind cut with artistic elements and non-standard facet arrangements.
